Name: short_desc
Description: A brief description of the parameter

Name: extra_desc
Description: Additional, more detailed, information about the parameter

Name: context
Description: Context required to set the parameter's value

Name: vartype
Description: Parameter type (bool, integer, real, or string)

Name: source
Description: Source of the current parameter value

Name: min_val
Description: Minimum allowed value of the parameter (NULL for non-numeric values)

Name: max_val
Description: Maximum allowed value of the parameter (NULL for non-numeric values)
